name: Alien Encounter (jammer-hammer, FarmCreek, bastianilso, H40S, busser, jagniton)
name_original: Alien Encounter (jammer-hammer, FarmCreek, bastianilso, H40S, busser, jagniton)
description:
You and a group of talented, young, highly-trained and poorly paid Space Team Men, has been assigned mission: "Alien Encounter".

Orders from up top

Aliens has entered and infected one of our spacebases, and it is your task to get rid of them! Standard pew-pew lasers has been issued!Move: WASD

  • Aim & Shoot: Mouse

Mission: Push the front, and take all checkpoints along the corridor (in order), and push out the scum!

This is an online multiplayer team match, capture all the points in order to win, remember to always take the points in order.

Not due to lack of time or anything. But your enemies might spawn as human models. So lets just say, they are in disguise! making it even harder to make friend from foe!
